about.title: The intelligent phone assistant
about.subtitle: Are you familiar with the stressful daily routine of telephone calls?
about.desc: Ringing phones, missed calls, stressed employees – it doesn't have to be this way. MrBot is your smart phone assistant that automatically answers calls, forwards messages, and coordinates appointments – friendly, reliable, and available 24/7.

items.title: Customer Calls
items.description: MrBot answers every call politely – even after work hours or when your team is busy.

items.title: Intelligent Conversation Management
items.description: The AI assistant understands concerns, answers frequently asked questions, and gathers all important information – all in compliance with GDPR.

items.title: Forwarding & Notification
items.description: Important calls or messages are automatically forwarded to you or your team – via email, SMS, or chat. Appointments are entered and managed in your existing CRM system.

impressum.title: Impressum Requirement
impressum.desc: Any commercial website must provide a legally required Impressum. It must be easily visible, immediately accessible, and permanently available.

privacy.title: GDPR Privacy Policy
privacy.desc: A Privacy Policy is required whenever a website stores logs, uses cookies, analytics, or collects emails. It must be clearly visible and accessible at all times.

notEnough.title: What Is Not Enough
notEnough.desc: A copyright notice alone does not fulfill Impressum or Privacy Policy obligations.

risks.title: Risks of Missing Compliance
risks.desc: Missing legal requirements may lead to legal warnings, fines, and loss of credibility.

recommendation.title: Practical Recommendation
recommendation.desc: Include Impressum, Privacy Policy, optional Terms & Conditions, contact link, and copyright in the footer.

contact.title: Get in touch with us
contact.description: Are you interested in collaborating? Please fill out the form and we will get back to you shortly. We look forward to hearing from you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) about MrBot
faq.subtitle: MrBot is a 24/7 intelligent phone assistant that handles calls efficiently, ensures GDPR compliance, and requires no setup.
faq.a1: MrBot is an intelligent phone assistant that automatically answers incoming calls, responds politely, and handles common requests. It can schedule appointments, provide information, or take messages — just like a real human assistant, but available 24/7.
faq.a2: MrBot is built for medical practices, small businesses, and service providers who receive many routine calls every day. It helps reduce staff workload, improves availability, and ensures that no call is ever missed, even outside office hours.
faq.a3: Yes. Data protection is a top priority at MrBot. All data is processed exclusively on servers located within the EU, and no call recordings are stored permanently unless you explicitly agree. MrBot fully complies with GDPR regulations, and a Data Processing Agreement (DPA) can be provided upon request.
faq.q4: Do I need to install or program anything?
faq.a4: No. MrBot is a no-code solution that’s fully set up for you. You don’t need any technical experience — we handle everything, from connecting your phone system to integrating your calendar.
